etomica.graphics

Class DisplayPlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.graphics.Display
      • etomica.graphics.DisplayPlot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSetListener, GraphicalElement

    public class DisplayPlot
extends Display
implements DataSetListener
    Class for creating a plot of simulation data. Data for plot is taken from a DataSinkTable instance, which can be obtained via the getDataTable method. Data sets are added to the plot by piping the data to a new DataSink obtained from the makeColumn method of the data table.

    • Nested Class Summary

        public DataSet getDataSet()
